attributes.action: the rip off of car insurance companies
attributes.additional_details: i have 5 years no claims. no difference in my circumstances from last year but yet my insurance went up. we are already struggling with money with bills going sky high and now car insurance is continuing to rise every year. i want the government to look in to why this is happening. i cant afford to keep my car on the road anymore. soon there will be only the wealthy that can insure their cars. no wonder there are so many drivers without insurance if it continues to rise anymore.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the insurance industry.
